author: pbs.org
title: Juliette Binoche on "The 33" Charlie Rose The Week
text: Academy Award-winning actress Juliette Binoche talks to Charlie Rose about her leading role in "The 33," a new film about the Chilean mine rescue that ended five years ago this week. Binoche plays Maria Segovia, a relative of one of the trapped miners, who becomes the de facto leader of the families camped at the mine's entrance.
